11#include "audio/audio_state.h"
12
13#include <algorithm>
14#include <memory>
15#include <utility>
16#include <vector>
17
18#include "audio/audio_receive_stream.h"
19#include "audio/audio_send_stream.h"
20#include "modules/audio_device/include/audio_device.h"
21#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
22#include "rtc_base/logging.h"
23#include "rtc_base/ref_counted_object.h"
24#include "rtc_base/thread.h"
25
26namespace webrtc {
27namespace internal {
28
29AudioState::AudioState(const AudioState::Config& config)
30 : config_(config),
31 audio_transport_(config_.audio_mixer,
32 config_.audio_processing.get(),
33 config_.async_audio_processing_factory.get()) {
34 process_thread_checker_.Detach();
35 RTC_DCHECK(config_.audio_mixer);
36 RTC_DCHECK(config_.audio_device_module);
37}
38
39AudioState::~AudioState() {
40 RTC_DCHECK(thread_checker_.IsCurrent());
41 RTC_DCHECK(receiving_streams_.empty());
42 RTC_DCHECK(sending_streams_.empty());
43}
44
45AudioProcessing* AudioState::audio_processing() {
46 return config_.audio_processing.get();
47}
48
49AudioTransport* AudioState::audio_transport() {
50 return &audio_transport_;
51}
52
53bool AudioState::typing_noise_detected() const {
54 RTC_DCHECK(thread_checker_.IsCurrent());
55 return audio_transport_.typing_noise_detected();
56}
57
58void AudioState::AddReceivingStream(webrtc::AudioReceiveStream* stream) {
59 RTC_DCHECK(thread_checker_.IsCurrent());
60 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(0, receiving_streams_.count(stream));
61 receiving_streams_.insert(stream);
62 if (!config_.audio_mixer->AddSource(
63 static_cast<internal::AudioReceiveStream*>(stream))) {
64 RTC_DLOG(LS_ERROR) << "Failed to add source to mixer.";
65 }
66
67 // Make sure playback is initialized; start playing if enabled.
68 UpdateNullAudioPollerState();
69 auto* adm = config_.audio_device_module.get();
70 if (!adm->Playing()) {
71 if (adm->InitPlayout() == 0) {
72 if (playout_enabled_) {
73 adm->StartPlayout();
74 }
75 } else {
76 RTC_DLOG_F(LS_ERROR) << "Failed to initialize playout.";
77 }
78 }
79}
80
81void AudioState::RemoveReceivingStream(webrtc::AudioReceiveStream* stream) {
82 RTC_DCHECK(thread_checker_.IsCurrent());
83 auto count = receiving_streams_.erase(stream);
84 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(1, count);
85 config_.audio_mixer->RemoveSource(
86 static_cast<internal::AudioReceiveStream*>(stream));
87 UpdateNullAudioPollerState();
88 if (receiving_streams_.empty()) {
89 config_.audio_device_module->StopPlayout();
90 }
91}
92
93void AudioState::AddSendingStream(webrtc::AudioSendStream* stream,
94 int sample_rate_hz,
95 size_t num_channels) {
96 RTC_DCHECK(thread_checker_.IsCurrent());
97 auto& properties = sending_streams_[stream];
98 properties.sample_rate_hz = sample_rate_hz;
99 properties.num_channels = num_channels;
100 UpdateAudioTransportWithSendingStreams();
101
102 // Make sure recording is initialized; start recording if enabled.
103 auto* adm = config_.audio_device_module.get();
104 if (!adm->Recording()) {
105 if (adm->InitRecording() == 0) {
106 if (recording_enabled_) {
107 adm->StartRecording();
108 }
109 } else {
110 RTC_DLOG_F(LS_ERROR) << "Failed to initialize recording.";
111 }
112 }
113}
114
115void AudioState::RemoveSendingStream(webrtc::AudioSendStream* stream) {
116 RTC_DCHECK(thread_checker_.IsCurrent());
117 auto count = sending_streams_.erase(stream);
118 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(1, count);
119 UpdateAudioTransportWithSendingStreams();
120 if (sending_streams_.empty()) {
121 config_.audio_device_module->StopRecording();
122 }
123}
124
125void AudioState::SetPlayout(bool enabled) {
126 RTC_LOG(INFO) << "SetPlayout(" << enabled << ")";
127 RTC_DCHECK(thread_checker_.IsCurrent());
128 if (playout_enabled_ != enabled) {
129 playout_enabled_ = enabled;
130 if (enabled) {
131 UpdateNullAudioPollerState();
132 if (!receiving_streams_.empty()) {
133 config_.audio_device_module->StartPlayout();
134 }
135 } else {
136 config_.audio_device_module->StopPlayout();
137 UpdateNullAudioPollerState();
138 }
139 }
140}
141
142void AudioState::SetRecording(bool enabled) {
143 RTC_LOG(INFO) << "SetRecording(" << enabled << ")";
144 RTC_DCHECK(thread_checker_.IsCurrent());
145 if (recording_enabled_ != enabled) {
146 recording_enabled_ = enabled;
147 if (enabled) {
148 if (!sending_streams_.empty()) {
149 config_.audio_device_module->StartRecording();
150 }
151 } else {
152 config_.audio_device_module->StopRecording();
153 }
154 }
155}
156
157void AudioState::SetStereoChannelSwapping(bool enable) {
158 RTC_DCHECK(thread_checker_.IsCurrent());
159 audio_transport_.SetStereoChannelSwapping(enable);
160}
161
162void AudioState::UpdateAudioTransportWithSendingStreams() {
163 RTC_DCHECK(thread_checker_.IsCurrent());
164 std::vector<AudioSender*> audio_senders;
165 int max_sample_rate_hz = 8000;
166 size_t max_num_channels = 1;
167 for (const auto& kv : sending_streams_) {
168 audio_senders.push_back(kv.first);
169 max_sample_rate_hz = std::max(max_sample_rate_hz, kv.second.sample_rate_hz);
170 max_num_channels = std::max(max_num_channels, kv.second.num_channels);
171 }
172 audio_transport_.UpdateAudioSenders(std::move(audio_senders),
173 max_sample_rate_hz, max_num_channels);
174}
175
176void AudioState::UpdateNullAudioPollerState() {
177 // Run NullAudioPoller when there are receiving streams and playout is
178 // disabled.
179 if (!receiving_streams_.empty() && !playout_enabled_) {
180 if (!null_audio_poller_)
181 null_audio_poller_ = std::make_unique<NullAudioPoller>(&audio_transport_);
182 } else {
183 null_audio_poller_.reset();
184 }
185}
186} // namespace internal
187
188rtc::scoped_refptr<AudioState> AudioState::Create(
189 const AudioState::Config& config) {
190 return rtc::make_ref_counted<internal::AudioState>(config);
191}
192} // namespace webrtc
